welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Harahan, the charming city known for its southern hospitality and beautiful scenic views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

airports.airport_name: Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport houses all the major airlines and provides a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal at the airport, primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the newest terminal at the airport, featuring modern architecture and a variety of shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first 30 minutes and then available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lakefront Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lakefront Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
